Footscray Rugby Shop

Official club merchandise and apparel

Online Shop Coming Soon!

We're working hard to bring you our new online shop where you'll be able to purchase official Footscray Rugby Club merchandise including jerseys, training gear, accessories, and more.

What to expect:

  • Official 2025 playing jerseys
  • Training gear and casual wear
  • Club accessories and supporter gear
  • Kids and youth sizes available
  • Easy pickup from the club

Player Kit Available Now!

Players who have paid their subs can purchase their playing kit at the club:

Complete Kit $80
OR purchase separately:
Shorts $45
Training Tee $45
Socks $15

Available for pickup during training hours

Footscray Rugby Club

Melbourne's premier community rugby club. Join us for rugby, friendship, and tradition in the heart of the western suburbs.
